properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 3:34PM HST until February 7 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR THE SUMMITS OF MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA
LOA...

.Deep moisture along a front will be over the Big Island tonight,
producing periods of snow showers and freezing rain. The threat
of significant winter weather may extend into Friday.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches.

* WHERE...Big Island Summits above 10,500 feet.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. This advisory may need to be
extended into Friday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will
significantly reduce visibility at times, with periods of zero
visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A High Wind Warning is also in effect for
the summits through Sunday morning with southwest to west winds
45 to 75 mph with localized gusts over 90 mph.
properties.instruction:
Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use
caution while driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY
